title: Collaborative Mathematics Teaching Skills Design Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Enhances pre-service teachers' field adaptability by solving tasks reflecting real classroom scenarios in an open learning environment, with motivation-centered design using personal devices and collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in open-ended problem situations.
Learners can develop and present three or more mathematics education scenarios reflecting real classroom contexts.
Learners can reflect on their instructional design process through four or more stages using a metacognitive checklist.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
